channel.title: Smine Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 0.4.0
item.description:
• volumn Slider Will Update Continuous.
  • Smine will save playing index info while playing changed.
  • Add Option: Stop scrobbling to Last.Fm when screen saver running.
  • Searialize using NSCoding.
  • Add a version compare system to player config files
